      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        An efficient check for equality. It only checks the bases, first, if the number of bases is equal, and then if the base values are the same.
        Specified by:
        equals in class Chromosome
        Returns:
        equal The equality of the passed object with this object.

        hashCode A correct hash code.

      • doMutation

        public void doMutation()
        Mutate by randomly setting a base to a new integer value within 'low' and 'high' (both included). It may occur that the new value is equal to the old.
        Specified by:
        doMutation in class Chromosome

      • mixSoup

        public void mixSoup()
        Initial creation of alleles. Integers are randomly drawn from uniform distribution (eventually biased).
        Specified by:
        mixSoup in class Chromosome

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Convert chromosome to string. The first base (the rightmost) has index 0.
        Specified by:
        toString in class Chromosome

      • fromString

        public void fromString(java.lang.String b)
        Create bases from String. The syntax of the string must be like this: "1|2|3|4|", where the numbers are just examples, but the '|' character must be exactly at the given spots.
        Specified by:
        fromString in class Chromosome
        Parameters:
        b - a String describing the bases
